name: Soccer Pop Go
description:
Soccer Pop is a new style of football game playing in hand. Easy to play but hard to master. Challenge yourself with the computer opponents or your real friends!! Join us and become a football star!

Control your character to kick the ball and Goal! The player who scores more in each round would win.

Game Features:
-- Three play modules offered: Single play with computer opponent, 2-play mode on the same device, and challenge mode to challenge yourself and compete each task!
-- Unlock different characters and football field, enjoy various playing fun
-- Smooth and easy gameplay. Enjoy the fun of playing football with your friends and family
-- Fun props allow you to turn the table at any time and experience extreme pleasure.

Experience the most immersive football game. Download Soccer Pop and enjoy the most exciting battle now!
